responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you through new virus affecting the world called Corona Virus or covid-19

coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a newly discovered coronavirus.Most people who fall sick with COVID-19 will experience mild to moderate symptoms and recover without special treatment.

patterns: what are the symptoms of covid 19
how to know if i have the virus.
responses: Fever or chills ,Cough ,Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing,Fatigue,Muscle or body aches,Headache,New loss of taste or smell,Sore throat,Congestion or runny nose,Nausea or vomiting,Diarrhea

patterns: what is the vaccine to cure covid 19
responses: We have vaccine for covid 19 developed by U.S based comapanies named Pfizer and Moderna

patterns: how to protect ourself from covid 19?
Health saving practacies to avoid the virus
responses: wear the mask in indoor places,stay or stand 2 meters from people , wash hands regularly for 20 seconds
